intro: Cadetia dischorensis, commonly known as the narrow-leaved bellflower, is a flowering plant native to southern Africa. It has narrow, lance-shaped leaves and produces small, clustered flowers during the spring and summer months. Cadetia dischorensis is often found in mountainous regions and is valued for its ornamental appeal in gardens.
